hero.small-text: We transform your images into unique decorative pieces with precious stones, mirrors, and resin finishes

works.title: Recent Work
works.subtitle: Each piece is hand-decorated with attention to detail

features.title: Our Artisan Process
features.subtitle: We combine multiple techniques to create unique pieces

materials.title: Natural Stones
materials.description: Pyrite, quartz, amethyst, and other semi-precious stones hand-placed for depth and texture

finishes.title: Resin Finishes
finishes.description: Careful application of epoxy resin for a brilliant, lasting finish, heat treated for a smooth surface and cured over hours to prevent bubbles

mirrors.title: Mirror Frames
mirrors.description: Custom MDF 6 wood framing, or mirror frames that add elegance and visually expand space

led.title: LED Lighting
led.description: Optional LED light strips that highlight the piece and create special ambiance

commission.title: Custom Work
commission.text: Bring your favorite image: a photo, portrait, diploma, or any artwork, and we'll transform it into a unique decorative piece. We add custom frames, natural stones, special finishes, and more.

features.pyrite: Decoration with pyrite and semi-precious stones
features.mirrors: Wood or mirror frames with optional LED lighting
features.resin: Epoxy resin finishes for protection and shine
features.negative-space: Gold-black painting techniques in negative space
features.shipping: Local delivery in Estado de México and Mexico City metro area, national and international shipping for small pieces

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: Share your image and vision. We discuss material options, size, and design for your project.

quotation.title: Quote
quotation.description: You receive a detailed quote with estimated time and cost. No surprises, everything is clear from the start.

creation.title: Creation
creation.description: We work on your piece for 3 - 7 days depending on size. We stay in touch and send progress photos.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Personal local delivery or carefully packaged shipping for small pieces. Each piece includes certificate of authenticity.

hero.small-text: Explore our collection of hand-decorated luxury art pieces

hero.title: Design Your Commission
hero.subtitle: Use this tool to estimate the cost of your project. Final pricing will be confirmed based on your exact specifications

size.title: Painting Size
size.subtitle: Select the size of your artwork. Larger pieces have higher base costs due to materials and labor.

stones.title: Stone Coverage
stones.subtitle: Hand-placed pyrite, quartz, and semi-precious stones create stunning visual depth and texture.

frame.title: Frame Selection
frame.subtitle: Choose the perfect frame to complement your enhanced artwork.

wooden.label: Wooden Frame
wooden.description: Classic elegance with premium wooden finish

mirror.label: Mirror Frame
mirror.description: Reflective mirror accents for added depth

led-wooden.label: LED Wooden Frame
led-wooden.description: Illuminated wooden frame with ambient lighting

led-mirror.label: LED Mirror Frame
led-mirror.description: Ultimate luxury with lights and mirrors

features.title: Special Features
features.subtitle: Transform your art into something truly unique with functional design elements.

clock.label: Clock Mechanism
clock.description: Transform your art into a functional, elegant timepiece

diamond-strips.label: "Diamond" Strips
diamond-strips.description: Reflective strips of cloth in the inner frame to bring out the painting

studs.label: Studs In Picture
studs.description: Small spheres of either mirror studs or solid colors to give a sense of depth to the image

leds.label: LEDs In Picture
leds.description: Usable light strips inside the viewing space with dedicated wall connectors

treatments.title: Surface Treatments
treatments.subtitle: Premium finishes that enhance your artwork with luxury materials and techniques.

resin.label: Epoxy Resin Coating
resin.description: Creates a glossy, crystalline finish that beautifully catches and reflects light

geode.label: "Geode" Negative Space
geode.description: Combines two different colors to diffuse across the negative space to create a texture akin to geodes

hero.title: Get In Touch
hero.subtitle: Have a question about commissions, shipping, or custom designs? We'd love to hear your ideas.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24-48 hours. For commission inquiries, please include as much detail as possible about your vision.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your project, question, or how we can help...

form.ps: For commissions: Please include painting size, desired materials, and any reference images you have.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: Thank you for reaching out! We've received your message and will get back to you within 24-48 hours.

error.title: Error Sending Message
error.message: There was an error sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly.

footer.about: Atelier Geode transforms ordinary images into unique decorative pieces through artisan framing techniques, natural stone decoration, and resin finishes.
footer.shipping: Local delivery for majority pieces. International and national shipping only for small pieces.
footer.packaging: Special packaging for protection during shipping.
